Success.title: 请求是否成功

UpdateInstanceName.title: UpdateInstanceName

GetInstanceDetail.summary: Get the details of an instance.

Success.title: 请求是否成功
Success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful.

InstanceStatus.title: 状态
InstanceStatus.description:
The instance status. Valid values:

*   creating.
*   running.
*   updating. Cluster scaling (up/down), configuration changes, and enabling/disabling public network access.
*   disable. The cluster has expired and needs to be renewed for activation.
*   deleting.
*   deleted.

PackageType.title: 规格
PackageType.description:
The specification details. Valid values:

*   trial.
*   standard.

ComponentType.title: 组件类型
ComponentType.description:
The component type. Valid values:

*   standalone
*   proxy
*   mix_coordinator
*   query
*   index
*   data

AttuPort.title: Attu组件端口
AttuPort.description: The port of the Attu component.

OssStorageTimestamp.title: OSS存储指标时间
OssStorageTimestamp.description: The timestamp when the OSS metric is stored.

OssStorageSize.title: OSS存储数据大小
OssStorageSize.description: The size of the data stored in OSS.

OpenPublicNet.title: 是否开启公网
OpenPublicNet.description: Indicates whether Internet access is enabled.

PayType.title: 付费类型
PayType.description:
The billing method of the instance. Valid values:

*   0: pay-as-you-go
*   1: subscription

AclId.title: 公网访问控制aclId
AclId.description: AclId for Public Network Access Control.

TemplateVersion.title: 软件栈版本
TemplateVersion.description: The version of the software stack.

AccessDeniedDetail.title: 权限校验失败详情
AccessDeniedDetail.description: The detailed information about the failed permission verification.

GetInstanceDetail.title: GetInstanceDetail

ListInstances.summary: Get the list of Milvus instances under the current account.

schema.title: 页码
schema.description: The page number of the returned page.

schema.title: 分页大小
schema.description: The number of entries per page.

Success.title: 请求是否成功
Success.description: Indicates whether the request was successful.

InstanceStatus.title: 状态
InstanceStatus.description:
The status of the bastion host. Valid values:

*   creating.
*   running.
*   updating. Cluster scaling (up/down), configuration changes, and enabling/disabling public network access.
*   disable. The cluster has expired and needs to be renewed for activation.
*   deleting.
*   deleted.

PackageType.title: 规格
PackageType.description:
The specification details. Valid values:

*   trial.
*   standard.

ComponentType.title: 组件类型
ComponentType.description:
The type of the component. Valid values:

*   standalone
*   proxy
*   mix_coordinator
*   query
*   index
*   data

TotalDiskSize.title: 磁盘总量
TotalDiskSize.description: The total capacity of the disk.

AttuPort.title: attu组件端口
AttuPort.description: The port of the Attu component.

OpenPublicNet.title: 是否开启公网
OpenPublicNet.description: Indicates whether Internet access is enabled.

PayType.title: 付费类型
PayType.description:
The billing method of the instance. Valid values:

*   0: pay-as-you-go
*   1: subscription

AccessDeniedDetail.title: 权限校验失败详情
AccessDeniedDetail.description: The detailed information about the failed permission verification.
